title: I'll tell you where to put your airport
creator_credit: John Groom, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: Program contrasts the modelling technique used in planning the new Mexico City Airpors with that used by the Roskill Commission for the siting of the third London Airport. Part 5 of Technology, a third level course. Systems modelling series.
title_for_label: I’ll tell you where to put your airport
